name: Cube Match 3D: Tile Games
description:
Match Cube Tile Master 3D is an original triple match puzzle games with the most attractive levels. In this classic tile master 3D games, start the triple tile cubes to complete the levels. Match cube puzzle 3D is a very relaxing block shape tile games. If you are unable to find your desired object then swipe the 3D cube block to rotate at 360 degrees and match 3 tiles puzzle. Cube triple match puzzle games not only connects yoaur brain to logical thinking but also kills your boredom.

Triple tile match 3D games is very fun and challenging for every age group to play and enjoy this amazing cube match games . All you need is to download triple tile matching master and compare three identical shapes to finish the 3D tile master levels. Solve tile cube block with quick thinking and smart strategy to earn more reward and get to the next level.

Match Cube 3D Puzzle offers you more challenging levels and a beautiful interface to pair and triple tile in match cube games. Find three identical color shapes in 3d cube block and eliminate them by triple matching. Triple Tile Master 3D games will help you to release your daily stress, relax your muscles and boost your memory.

How to play Cube Master 3D games :

Tap on the play button to start cube games. Tap on 3D tiles that look same and triple match by moving them in boxes. Match triple pair all the 3D objects within given time to clear the level and earn reward. Make triple match quickly to maintain your streak and earn more reward. If all seven boxes are filled up with different shapes objects, the color shape puzzle game will be over and you will lose triple tile 3D. Keep clearing the levels one by one to unlock more levels and more reward and become cube master 3D.

Features in 3D block puzzle games:

A very well designed tile master game.
User friendly interface and interactive graphics.Realistic stunning and amazing animation.
360 Degree Rotation: Swipe cube block to rotate it in any direction, find and your desired object easily.
Colorful,unique and pleasing 3D blocks will help you to solve puzzle with more fun and happy mood. Tons of rich variety of colorful and unique cubes: cute animals, colorful toys, birds, mouth watering fruits and numbers with different colors and styles.
Available to play on both devices mobile and tablet.
Each level theme and cubes will be changed randomly, please play 3D match game and enjoy it!
You can pause triple match at any time and anywhere and you can start it where you left. You can also play this offline.
Cube match puzzle have tons of different levels to train your brain and increase your logical thinking.

Download and enjoy our free match cube puzzle. If you like our game please support us by giving reviews and ratings. Thank you very much.

If you have any queries, please feel comfortable to contact us.
